name: Spaceship Joyride!
description:
Tilt your device to move your spaceship through the terrible dangers of space. Dodge any obstacles that get in your way and collect stars and astronauts. The further you go, the higher your score! Try and beat your friends!

FEATURES
► Record gameplay videos and share them with your friends!
► Compete with your friends using Game Center Leaderboard
► Get a notification when you overtake your Game Center friends!
► Uses iCloud to synch your scores with all your devices
► Share your score in Facebook and Twitter
► Casual game, easy to use
► Polished design
► Retina Support
► Universal App
